none.$description: No border radius. Sharp corners for specific cases.

sm.$description: Small radius - 4px. Subtle rounding for tight elements.

md.$description: Medium radius - 8px. Default for buttons, inputs, small cards.

lg.$description: Large radius - 16px. Bento cards, problem cards, major surfaces. Core shape language.

xl.$description: Extra large radius - 24px. Hero cards, prominent containers.

pill.$description: Pill shape - fully rounded ends. Tag chips, filter chips, voice input button.

circle.$description: Perfect circle - for avatars, FABs, circular action buttons.
